MISSING_KEYWORDS: Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud)
RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **Big Data** frameworks like **Hadoop**, **Spark**, and **Kafka** in the experience section to increase visibility for relevant searches.

Detail experience with **Cloud platforms** like **AWS**, **Azure**, or **Google Cloud** in project descriptions or a dedicated cloud skills section. This shows practical application of cloud technologies.
Explicitly mention experience with **Deep Learning** frameworks such as **TensorFlow** or **PyTorch** within project descriptions or skills section, as they are highly valued in the job description.
Add details about implementing **data pipelines** using technologies like **Spark** or **Kafka**, highlighting the scalability and efficiency of these implementations.
Include projects where you applied **statistical modeling** techniques, specifically mentioning the types of models used and the business insights derived.
Quantify the impact of **data driven solutions** developed in previous roles, focusing on measurable improvements or outcomes achieved.
Incorporate **MLOps** and **model monitoring** techniques used in deployed machine learning models to demonstrate understanding of production environments.
Highlight experience with both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, providing specific examples of database management or optimization tasks performed.
Create a separate section for **Certifications** and explicitly mention your certifications in Data science and AI domain.
Include your contributions in projects related to **natural language processing (NLP)**, detailing the specific tools and techniques applied.

Hadoop.DESCRIPTION: This specialization provides a comprehensive introduction to Big Data, including the Hadoop ecosystem, MapReduce, and Spark. It covers data storage, processing, and analysis techniques.
Learn the fundamentals of the Hadoop platform, including its architecture, components, and application framework. Covers data ingestion, storage, and processing using Hadoop.
This free course provides a basic introduction to Hadoop and MapReduce, covering the core concepts and components of the Hadoop ecosystem.

Spark.DESCRIPTION: This specialization covers Apache Spark, including its architecture, components, and programming model. Learn how to use Spark for big data processing, machine learning, and real-time analytics.

Spark.COURSE_NAME: Scalable Machine Learning with Apache Spark
Spark.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Apache Spark for scalable machine learning applications. Covers data ingestion, processing, and model training using Spark's MLlib library.

Spark.COURSE_NAME: Spark and Python for Big Data with PySpark
Spark.DESCRIPTION: This free course introduces Apache Spark and PySpark for big data processing with Python. Covers data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using PySpark.

Kafka.DESCRIPTION: Master Kafka Connect to build scalable, reliable data pipelines, integrating diverse systems with ease.

Kafka.COURSE_NAME: Real-Time Data Pipelines with Apache Kafka
Kafka.DESCRIPTION: Craft real-time data pipelines using Apache Kafka, ensuring efficient data flow and processing.
A concise guide on getting started with Apache Kafka, including setting up and basic operations.

AWS.DESCRIPTION: Learn to construct scalable serverless applications on AWS using Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.
Gain fundamental knowledge of AWS cloud services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.
An introduction to AWS cloud computing, covering essential services and how to start building on AWS.

Azure.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals AZ-900 Exam Prep Specialization
Azure.DESCRIPTION: Prepare for the AZ-900 certification by mastering Azure fundamentals, including cloud concepts, services, security, and compliance.
Learn about the technologies that comprise Microsoft Azure solutions
This free course provides a basic introduction to Azure services.

Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain a foundational understanding of Google Cloud's core infrastructure, services, and solutions.

Google Cloud.COURSE_NAME: Preparing for the Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect Exam
Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: Helps students prepare to take the Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect exam.

Google Cloud.COURSE_NAME: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Tutorial for Beginners
Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: The Google Cloud Platform, or GCP, is a collection of over 100 cloud computing services from Google.

TensorFlow.DESCRIPTION: Learn TensorFlow to design, build, and train neural networks and use them to create exciting AI applications.

TensorFlow.COURSE_NAME: TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning
TensorFlow.DESCRIPTION: A broad introduction to TensorFlow, teaching you the fundamentals of the library and how to apply it in various ML tasks.
Step-by-step guide on getting started with TensorFlow, covering basic operations and model creation.

PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: Explore deep learning techniques using PyTorch, from basic tensor operations to building complex neural networks.

PyTorch.COURSE_NAME: Intro to Deep Learning with PyTorch
PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: Get an introduction to deep learning with PyTorch, including coding neural networks
Comprehensive tutorial on PyTorch, teaching you to build and train deep learning models from scratch.

MLOps.DESCRIPTION: Learn to apply DevOps principles to machine learning, automating and streamlining ML workflows.
Intro to MLOps and what MLOps solves
Complete MLOps course, where students learn about the lifecycle of machine learning models

Model monitoring.COURSE_NAME: AI Model Monitoring: From Development to Production
Model monitoring.DESCRIPTION: Learn to monitor AI models effectively, ensuring high performance and addressing issues that arise post-deployment.

Model monitoring.COURSE_NAME: AI Product Management: Build Responsible AI Products
Model monitoring.DESCRIPTION: Covers responsible AI product development including model monitoring.
Demonstrates techniques for monitoring machine learning models and ensuring transparency.
